inputs: A modern, minimalistic logo with four abstract shapes forming a symmetrical pattern, resembling {shape}. The shapes point to the edges of the logo. The shapes together have a white outline . Each shape is outlined in white with two filled in vibrant gradient colors ({subject_clr_0} and {subject_clr_1}) and two left as hollow, so only should the white outline is visible . The design sits on a dark pitch black background. Below the icon, include placeholder text in Hungarian: '{text_0}' in bold {text_clr_0} {font} font and '{text_1}' in smaller {text_clr_1} {font} font. The style should be clean, flat, and professional, suitable for a tech or eco-friendly company.

parameters.negative_prompt: no 3D effects, no shadows, no bevel, no gradients outside the shapes, no textures, no metallic effects, no photographs, no complex details, no background patterns, no extra text, no glowing effects.
